name: htpdate
description: a tool to synchronize system time from web servers

scripts.b-all: npm run b-win-x86 && npm run b-win-x64 && npm run b-linux-x64 && npm run b-linux-arm64 && npm run b-mac-x64
scripts.c-win-x86: cd dists && cp htpdate-windows-x86.exe htpdate.exe && 7z a htpdate-windows-x86.7z htpdate.exe && rm -rf htpdate.exe
scripts.c-win-x64: cd dists && cp htpdate-windows-x64.exe htpdate.exe && 7z a htpdate-windows-x64.7z htpdate.exe && rm -rf htpdate.exe
scripts.c-linux-x64: cd dists && cp htpdate-linux-x64 htpdate && 7z a htpdate-linux-x64.7z htpdate && rm -rf htpdate
scripts.c-linux-arm64: cd dists && cp htpdate-linux-arm64 htpdate && 7z a htpdate-linux-arm64.7z htpdate && rm -rf htpdate
scripts.c-mac-x64: cd dists && cp htpdate-mac-x64 htpdate && 7z a htpdate-mac-x64.7z htpdate && rm -rf htpdate
scripts.compress: npm run c-win-x86 && npm run c-win-x64 && npm run c-linux-x64 && npm run c-linux-arm64 && npm run c-mac-x64
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run b-all && npm run clean
